sentences: In the morning, informal consultations continued on adverse impacts of climate change in the context of Decision 1/CP.10 .
Delegates discussed financial resources and mainstreaming activities in Annex I parties, preferring the use of planning and implementing rather than mainstreaming.

During the informal meeting on response measures in the afternoon, Chair Thompson suggested that parties refer to the paper provided by SBI Chair Asadi with a view to devising practical activities relating to response measures.
She outlined three broad categories for consideration: modeling, financial risk management, and economic diversification.
The discussion focused on modeling, with many parties seeking a better understanding of the Convention's role in this process.
enb_long_title: Twenty-sixth sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies (SB 26) of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
